title: Need to ID some fonts used by magazines and companies
content:
Hi guys,

I need to find out what fonts these companies use. If anyone knows please ID em :)

RealSimple (magazine)  
Ready Made (magazine)  
Make (Magazine)  
Apple  
Target  
FoodTV  
TiVo  
LifeHacker

Thanks!!
author: tannenhauser

comments.content:
First, search Typophile. Use Google, as it will produce more results.

Second, post images. It’s kind of asking a lot to make us go get them ourselves.

Third, it’s usually more convenient for future reference if you post the requests individually.

Just a thought.

Apple: Myriad  
Target: Helvetica  
Tivo and Make Magazine: Akzidenz Grotesk Bold
Bob, I completely agree with Michael. Next time at least put in the effort to post images for us to look at if you want us to put in the effort to identify those typefaces for you.
Right, Make is Franklin, not Akzidenz. Silly me.
